typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		status as integer,
		order as integer,
		created as timestamp,
		updated as timestamp,
		scheme_id as integer,
		is_deleted as boolean,
		link_date as timestamp,
		join_date as timestamp,
		balances as string,
		vouchers as string,
		barcode as string,
		card_number as string,
		transactions as string,
		main_answer as string,
		pll_links as string,
		formatted_images as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	batchSize: 10000,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SrcLoyaltyCardAccount
SrcLoyaltyCardAccount select(mapColumn(
		id,
		vouchers
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DstDataLake
